name: powerSwitch_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the power of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to have its power turned on.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action for the SmartThings device that needs to have its power turned on.
